name: Shelter Now
description:
YOU are the King, but your people have betrayed you and now you must protect your castle to survive.

Controls are LMB to shoot and RMB to place walls

When the peasants touch the wall there are 4 states they both survive and take damage, the wall survives takes damage, the peasant survives takes damage, and neither survive.

Play in full screen or the buttons look wonky its meant to be downloaded

Post any feedback so I can improve the game

High Score function doesn't work :(
